title: Machine Learning Practical Competencies Enhancement: Community of Practice-Based Simulation for Pre-Service Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three core elements of teacher professional development through Community of Practice (CoP) activities.
Learners propose at least two improved lesson designs reflecting peer teacher and expert feedback in a VR simulation environment.
Develop and present one pre-service teacher education model applying sociocultural learning theory.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
